remarks: The sum ` sum_ n <_ x ( 1 / sqrt n ) ` has the asymptotic expansion ` 2 sqrt x + L + O ( 1 / sqrt x ) ` , for some ` L ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 10-May-2016.)
statement:
divsqrtsum.2 $e |- F = ( x e. RR+ |-> ( sum_ n e. ( 1 ... ( |_ ` x ) ) ( 1 / ( sqrt ` n ) ) - ( 2 x. ( sqrt ` x ) ) ) ) $.
divsqrsum2.1 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~>r L ) $.
divsqrtsumo1 $p |- ( ph -> ( y e. RR+ |-> ( ( ( F ` y ) - L ) x. ( sqrt ` y ) ) ) e. O(1) ) $.
$d F y $.
$d L y $.
$d n ph y $.
$d n x $.
$d n x $.
